body: HUH ?

Yop. Just coming here to tell you of something concerning this work: I was planning on salvaging the translation if it was a little bit accurate, fixing it, doing a proper editing/typesetting... but, after asking a TL to take a look, it seems that there's nothing to salvage here. Quality of the translation is too low. So I'll start a bounty on Eh to find a proper translator once I finish working on "Oji-san To." (already did "Oji-san To. 2" in the past and a TL is currently working on the first one).
What a piece of shit. This is even worse than the mamezou MTL doujins from yesterday. @Psycho you got scammed by the clown who calls himself a TL and did this shoddy job.
this is fucked up

Bro i don't even mind the ntr but like i came from part 1 to see how the story unfolds but what the fuck i literally don't understand jack shit what a horrible translation

I mean, if she wants that then good for her I guess? It's only fiction so it doesn't matter at all, but I feel like him telling her, "I'll never love you, you're just a toy" was a bit much. What happens in 10 years? She's cool not having a future?
This art is the same of that manga were one shy/bullied girl take compensate dating from her bully's dad ?
